answers.answer: No you just need to watch your diet.  I have heard of women not being able to eat bread.  Also no artificial sugar.  That is what I have been told at least.  But dont stress too much your three hour could come back completely normal.

question: I had a one hour test for gestational diabetes& my doctor said it came back high so now their giving me the three hour test I don't know what to think will I have to give myself shots of insulin everyday if I do have gestational diabetes?.
title: gestational diabetes
